I have the following Cycles for trade.  I am looking for HOF Portraits G-VG.  List is below.  I prefer raw, however, will take graded.  Please PM or send an email to [url]tbotticell@gmail.com[/url] if interested in trading.  The trade values on the Cycles include shipping.

For Trade:
Sam Strang SGC 55 Cycle 350 - $235
Charles O' Leary SGC 30 - $215

Looking for the following HOF Portraits:
Chance Red/Yellow
Collins Eddie/Jimmy
Evers
Joss
Lajoie
Tinker
Waddell
Tinker
Wallace
Walsh
Wheat

Thanks, Tom
